Class SithLord

  • java.lang.Object
    • Entity
      • Person
        • SithLord
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasForce

    public class SithLord
extends Person
implements HasForce
    SithLord is a representation of a person that can use the force
    Author:
    Nick

    • Method Detail

      • useForce

        public void useForce(Entity e)
        SithLord's implementation of the HasForce interface's useForce method. Uses a random number between 1 and 2 to determine if the sith lord successfully uses the force. Then, another random number between 50 and 100 is used to determine how much damage is dealt. If the sith lord fails in using the force, its target will say its catch phrase, else the target will take damage from the sith lord and its health is modified accordingly. If the target is killed by the sith lord, the sith lord says its catch phrase. Whether the sith lord hits or misses, it's energy level is reduced to 0.
        Specified by:
        useForce in interface HasForce
        Parameters:
        e - Sith lord's target

      • attack

        public void attack(Entity e)
        SithLord's implementation of the Person's attack method. Uses a random number between 1 and 2 to determine if the sith lord's attack hits. Then, another random number between 25 and 50 is used to determine how much damage is dealt. If the sith lord misses, its target will say its catch phrase, else the target will take damage from the sith lord and its health is modified accordingly. If the target is killed by the sith lord, the sith lord says its catch phrase. Whether the sith lord hits or misses, it loses 25 energy.
        Specified by:
        attack in class Person
        Parameters:
        e - Sith lord's target

      • doTask

        public void doTask(Entity e,
                   int t)
        SithLord's implementation of Entity's doTask method. If the sith lord has no energy or below the amount of energy required for the task , it will not complete its task. Otherwise, the sith lord completes its task depending on the target and task input by the user.
        Specified by:
        doTask in class Entity
        Parameters:
        e - Sith lord's target
        t - Sith lord's task
